name: founders-map-quest
description: CSV Importer that generates companies geolocation data in a comprehensible way.

scripts.prepare-build-dirs: if [ $(rm -rf public/js) ]; then echo "Removing old built files..."; fi && mkdir -p public/js
scripts.build:client: browserify src/client.js -t babelify -d | exorcist public/js/app.js.map > public/js/app.js
scripts.uglify:client: uglifyjs public/js/app.js --compress --mangle --screw-ie8 --in-source-map public/js/app.js.map --source-map-include-sources --source-map public/js/app.js.map --source-map-url app.js.map --output public/js/app.js
scripts.build: npm run build:server & npm run build:client
scripts.build:prod: npm run build && npm run uglify:client
scripts.start:server: if [ "$NODE_ENV" == "development" ]; then nodemon ./src/server.js; else node ./lib/server.js; fi
scripts.start: npm run start:server & npm run start:client

author: Allan Baptista (allan.marques@ymail.com)
